mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, email, phone_num, create_time, update_time, credit, type, avatar) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone_num}, #{create_time}, #{update_time}, #{credit}, #{type}, #{avatar})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, phone_num = #{phone_num}, create_time = #{create_time}, update_time = #{update_time}, credit = #{credit}, type = #{type}, avatar = #{avatar} WHERE id = #{id}
